skillTree.name: Staff of Azyr
skillTree.description: Aurelion's staff is tied to the Wind of Azyr, to watch at the inside of the sphere allows her the power to see a small fraction of the future, although it requires great costs of energy to do so.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.name: Mount: White Lion Chariot
skillTree.description: Those who employ War Lion Chariots benefit considerably from the ferocity of the huge, snarling cats, keeping foes exposed to their cleaving weaponry.

skillTree.name: Mount: Griffon
skillTree.description: The wild Griffons of Ulthuan are creatures of noble bearing and keen intelligence, with whom Elves form bonds that only death can shatter.

skillTree.name: Lileath's Blessing
skillTree.description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Ring of Sacred Flames
skillTree.description: A potent and pale wall of flames surrounds the enemy, blinding him and slowly melting his skin away.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Acolyte of Teclis
skillTree.description: Learning from the High Loremaster is a invaluable gift for any elven mage, and such experience has allowed Aurelion to best older and more powerful sorcerers in battle.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

skillTree.name: Member of the Royal Family
skillTree.description: As the cousin of the Phoenix King Finubar, Aurelion had made some friends in high places across her short career, and have been granted a few gifts from the Seafarer.

skillTree.name: Cult Destroyer
skillTree.description: In her time helping Captain Von Kessel to uncover the remaining chaos forces and cults left after the Great War across the Empire, she has learned how to identify the most subtle chaos taint on suspects, and to exterminate it swiftly.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -40%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Ally of Mankind
skillTree.description: Even though she was dismissive of the abilities of Men, and saw them as a necessary nuisance and uncomfortable allies, her time spent in the Empire and in company of Von Kessel has soften her view of them, becoming more tolerant of their existence and manners.

skillTree.name: Storm Unleashed
skillTree.description: In the midst of battle, when facing desperate odds, a sorceress can lose control and try by all costs to get out of there alive, blasting aside ally and foe alike.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wind Blast"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind Blast Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Apotheosis Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Soul Quench"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Soul Quench Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Soul Quench Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Urannon's Thunderbolt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Urannon's Thunderbolt Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Chain Lightning"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Arcane Unforging"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Potential Energy
skillTree.description: The Archmage crackles and flows with energies that would unmake any mortal practitioner.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Absolute Control
skillTree.description: Mere talent alone is not enough, one must be truly gifted to be chosen to study at the Tower of Hoeth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.name: Greater Ward
skillTree.description: With precise applications of unmaking, any threat may be rendered null and void in turn.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Princess of Saphery
backgroundSkills.description: Having finished her mission with Von Kessel, and still mourning her brother’s death, Aurelion’s future looks uncertain, but her fierce determination to fight the Dark Forces remains unchanged.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +7 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(all units in army)
